data.text: @HSELive What about serious side effects from the original 2 doses? Does that not matter anymore?

@HSELive Informed consent. Fundamental principle of medical law. https://t.co/c0u7fBEIGb CONCLUSIONS, "Vaccination with mRNA-1273 associated with a significantly increased risk of MYOCARDITIS INFLAMMATION OF THE HEART or myopericarditis in the Danish population". https://t.co/fAYK4z7r0S https://t.co/EUsGLKAbGG

@HSELive https://t.co/uxFNnsfzeH Letter to Mr Stephen Donnelly on life saving treatments form Irish Doctor, Dr William Ralph trying to get this prevention and treatment used in Ireland. So far there has been silence despite the vast data. https://t.co/1OYmbrC7CR
